name: Workout-demo
body:
### Welcome to SWC UBC Workouts.
In Earth, Ocean and Atmospheric Sciences we have bi-weekly [software carpentry](http://software-carpentry.org/) workouts. This one was on making static webpages using github.io.

We also have yearly bootcamps.  Usually held in September.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
